column4: Quick question: 2, actually. Does anyone know how to remove the topic bar at the top of IRSII, and also - how can I edit the join/part/quit messages by IRSSI?
You want to remove the topic bar why?
Because I look at the topic bar once when I join, and it's just taking up space
/help set , /set join , /set part, /set quit . For the topic stuffs, you'll have to write your own theme
